channel.title: Making own bot
channel.description: Hi there.. Is there somewhere that there is a guide to making a own Runescape bot like aryan and so.. ?

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“xSignal, post:13, topic:2626”]Uhmm…I feel like making a bot today. xD

Aryan is a VERY good bot. We are very lucky to have a hold of the source.[/quote]

The community is lucky to have the source, and Aryan is a VERY good bot compared to…not having a bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

On the other hand, why would you want to make a bot like Aryan?

Read full topic

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

You don’t want to disable traps, just find ways to get around them. That’s the best way.

Read full topic

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

your best bet would be to experiment imho, try making simple ones like hp over head to learn how the client changes throughout.

then move onto finding traps and solutions (no not just removing their guts).

then if you want a simple effective bot import this java package:

import java.awt.robot;

this allows you to send mousemovements and keys etc, if you use it correctly you have a pwnage bot in your hands

Read full topic

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:7, topic:2626”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=2879.msg27416#msg27416 date=1147295194]
aryan is opensource, read it, understand it, and make your own bot
[/quote]

Thats alot harder then it sounds.[/quote]

yes, dont get me wrong, its ALOT harder than it sounds, making a bot is not easy work in the least bit

Read full topic

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:7, topic:2626”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=2879.msg27416#msg27416 date=1147295194]
aryan is opensource, read it, understand it, and make your own bot
[/quote]

Thats alot harder then it sounds.[/quote]

Well, its certainly a good way to start off.

If you comment every line, and come up with some sort of explanation for what is going on, you can learn a lot. Then reading tutorials afterwards will be much easier because you will reconise several lines. Reading a programming lnguage is almost always easy to do, just as long as you dont get overwhelmed with it all. I find it very easy to understand what is going on in a source code, but learning is much harder.

Read full topic

item.title: Making own bot
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

The best guide to making a bot like Aryan is the Aryan source, but there are some tutorials.

Unfortunately it seems like the only surviving repository is Ollie’s site, which is incomplete. Seems like Kamu wrote a decent (if now slightly outdated) tutorial back on kaitnieks.com, anyone have that?

Read full topic
